§ software-engineering

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

What **software engineering** is is most easily understood by first defining what **engineering** is.

❦

engineering (noun): The art of managing engines.

engineering (noun): The art of directing the artillery of an army.

engineering (noun): Any art where one is designing and constructing.

❦

software engineering (noun): The art of designing and constructing [[computer-software]].
